content: this legal text summarizes the progress of a court case in estonia the case involves a division of joint assets between two parties referred to as x and y the court ruled that x is responsible for covering the procedural costs the court refused xs additional claims and dismissed ys counterclaims the court ordered the division of joint assets including an apartment and movable properties x was awarded compensation from the majority of the joint assets and the right to use a specific property ys claim regarding a laptop was dismissed and x was awarded compensation for the division of joint assets the judgment is final and can be appealed within 30 days the court considered the evidence presented and made decisions based on applicable laws the court also discussed the division of loan obligations and expenses related to the property the court determined that a gift was given to the defendant and the claimant must pay a certain amount the court divided the money in the parties accounts and determined that joint assets must be divided equally the court also addressed the division of movable property and determined which items belong to each party the court considered the value of the defendants usage of an apartment and determined that the claimant must compensate the defendant the court also discussed changing the ownership entry in the land register the court awarded compensation to the claimant for their share of an apartment ownership the defendant objected but the court partially accepted their request the supreme court upheld the decision the court determined the compensation amount and offsetting claims the court found the method of dividing joint assets requested by the parties justified and granted ownership of the apartment property and certain movable property to the claimant the defendant was required to compensate the claimant the text also mentions the steps taken in the legal process involvement of a judge and scheduling of a hearing the case is ongoing and the relevant code articles are provided the judgment was signed digitally by judge xxxxxx
